scripts.start:chrome: cross-env BROWSER=chrome run-pty % npm run watch:helper % npm run chrome
scripts.start:firefox: cross-env BROWSER=firefox run-pty % npm run watch:helper % npm run firefox
scripts.firefox: sucrase-node scripts/wait-for-manifest.ts && npm run web-ext -- run --bc --devtools
scripts.build:helper: npm run compile:helper && sucrase-node scripts/build-clean.ts && npm run web-ext -- build && sucrase-node scripts/build-post.ts
scripts.build:firefox: cross-env BROWSER=firefox npm run build:helper && cross-env BROWSER=firefox npm run web-ext -- lint
scripts.build:all: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.test:playwright:firefox: npm run build:firefox && cross-env BROWSER=firefox playwright test --project=firefox
scripts.test:playwright:chromium: npm run build:chrome && cross-env BROWSER=chrome playwright test --project=chromium
scripts.test: npm run build:all && eslint . --report-unused-disable-directives && prettier --check . && tsc
scripts.test-manual: run-pty --auto-exit % npm run build:all % eslint . --report-unused-disable-directives % prettier --check . % tsc
